Fate Averted.name: Fate Averted
Fate Averted.flavor: You alter fate, rewriting your peopleâ€™s myths to serve your purpose.
Fate Averted.trigger: An ally within 20 squares of you is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer by an attack
Fate Averted.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Fate Averted.effect: You teleport the target to a square adjacent to you. The target regains hit points equal to 1 + his or her bloodied value and can make a basic attack as a free action.
